title: QB Conundrum
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss which team had the best comeback win on Sunday: the Cardinals, Jets, or Dolphins, if the Bengals or Colts are off to a more disappointing start and how the 49ers should feel about their QB situation. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
